LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_Poncho.label: Momu Poncho
LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_Poncho.description: A long, cloak-like garment to help you keep cool in the desert. Humans can wear it, too, but only if they have the same body type as the Momu!
LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_ThickJacket.label: Momu Thick Jacket
LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_ThickJacket.description: This jacket is thicker than the human standard, but doesn't interfere with one's movement like a parka. Humans can wear it, too, but only if they have the same body type as the Momu!
LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_SimpleShirt.label: Momu Simple Shirt
LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_SimpleShirt.description: A simple shirt, sewn with care. Humans can wear it, too, but only if they have the same body type as the Momu!
LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_RoyalCoat.label: Momu Royal Coat
LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_RoyalCoat.description: A fancy coat, often worn by important people. Humans can wear it, too, but only if they have the same body type as the Momu!
LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_EventClothes.label: Momu Event Clothes
LanguageData.Apparel_Momu_EventClothes.description: A fancy set of clothing for a night out on the town. Humans can wear it, too, but only if they have the same body type as the Momu!
